1.title: Planetary Log
1.plot: After the cataclysmic destruction of his home world, Apollo reports his encounters with the Xanadu system worlds as he seeks refuge, stretching further out into the darkness in this 8 part user interactive planetary mission log (Website).

2.title: Episode 2
2.plot: The saga of the Xanadian warrior refugee, Apollo, continues as he fights for survival against an all powerful and unjust enemy in a dangerous solar system where enemies lurk behind every planet, moon and asteroid.

imdb.plot outline: Xanadu Metropolis. A beacon of civilization, a fair and just city of learning and beauty, the capital of the Xanadu system planets. Apollo. A Xanadian , the last of his kind. A noble warrior brought to the brink of despair and defeat by the greed and dominance of the alliance, led by one who will not rest until all the worlds of the Xanadu system are under his complete control. One thing threatens to undo the carefully laid plans of this all powerful overlord and his absolute subjugation of the remaining population of the Xanadu system... The HyPro. A small device created by a beautiful female scholar in the science academy of the metropolis of Xanadu. Able to convert the Gaia energy of a blossoming flower to a stored electrical energy for use in our 4 dimensional realm. Almost limitless in supply, almost immeasurable in power. Apollo possesses the only HyPro in existence, smuggled from the metropolis under the raining fire of a heartless Alliance attack, an attack which destroyed the noble city of Xanadu and laid waste to millions of lives. Tempered by the furnace of the overlords cruelty, hardened by grief for loved ones slain, fueled by the Xanadian ethos to uphold justice and equality in the known universe, Apollo battles alone under the relentless pursuit of the overlords dark warriors. Will Apollo be strong enough, brave enough and enduring enough to keep the HyPro from the hands of those who would use it for it's darkest potential? And will his plight be forever solitary? Or will an unlikely ally cross his path when the last shred of his will is ready to break...
imdb.title: Xanadu Falls
plot: Xanadu, A world destroyed, grief for the genocide ripples through the remaining Xanadu system worlds. A lone surviving warrior fights for refuge, for life, protecting the secret he bears, gathering strength for the storm of revenge to come.
